title: Family Governance and Relationships During Temporary Vulnerability
description: As a person navigating complex family dynamics during crisis I want tools to coordinate family relationships across multiple contexts So that I can protect my children, maintain supportive connections, and navigate fraught family governance
content:
Feature: Family Governance and Relationships During Temporary Vulnerability
  As a person navigating complex family dynamics during crisis
  I want tools to coordinate family relationships across multiple contexts
  So that I can protect my children, maintain supportive connections, and navigate fraught family governance

  Background:
    Given I am managing family relationships during crisis
    And my family structure includes my children, potentially supportive extended family, and legal interface with abuser
    And I am using the family_elohim to coordinate complex family dynamics
    And some family relationships are supportive while others are harmful

  Scenario: Coordinating legal family governance with abusive ex-partner
    Given I am navigating custody, protective orders, and child support with my abuser
    And I need to minimize contact while managing legal obligations
    When legal family governance requires communication
    Then the family_elohim helps me manage legally-required communication only
    And provides templates for documented, bounded interactions
    And tracks all communications for legal purposes
    And helps me maintain protective boundaries while meeting legal requirements
    And alerts me to concerning patterns or escalation
    And my personal_agent coaches me through high-stress legal interactions
    And recognizes this boundary management as substantial emotional labor
    And validates that minimizing contact while co-parenting is appropriate

  Scenario: Protecting children's relationship with abusive parent when legally required
    Given my children have court-ordered visitation with their abusive parent
    And I need to support children's wellbeing within legal constraints
    When children navigate relationship with abusive parent
    Then the family_elohim helps me prepare children appropriately
    And tracks children's responses to visitation
    And helps me support children's processing of complex feelings
    And documents concerning behaviors for legal purposes if needed
    And connects me to resources on supporting children through this
    And my personal_agent reminds me of safety protocols around visitation
    And recognizes my emotional labor supporting children through this trauma
    And validates that my protective responses are appropriate

  Scenario: Coordinating support from extended family members who are helpful
    Given some extended family members (my parents, siblings) want to help
    And their support is genuine and appropriate
    When I coordinate family assistance with children or resources
    Then the family_elohim helps me organize extended family support
    And tracks who's helping with what to distribute requests fairly
    And maintains my authority as primary decision-maker
    And ensures family help respects my boundaries and parenting choices
    And facilitates communication about children's needs
    And my personal_agent helps me ask for help when needed
    And recognizes that coordinating family support is labor
    And validates that accepting help is strength, not failure

  Scenario: Managing boundaries with extended family members aligned with abuser
    Given some extended family members (potentially abuser's family, some of my family) excuse or minimize abuse
    And I need to protect myself and children from these relationships
    When problematic family members attempt contact or involvement
    Then the family_elohim helps me maintain firm boundaries
    And provides language for declining contact or setting limits
    And tracks boundary violations for safety purposes
    And supports me in limiting children's contact when appropriate
    And helps me navigate family pressure to reconcile or minimize abuse
    And my personal_agent validates that protecting my household is my right
    And recognizes boundary enforcement as essential protective labor
    And supports me saying "no" to family expectations that endanger wellbeing

  Scenario: Coordinating family information sharing to protect privacy and safety
    Given different family members have different levels of trustworthiness
    And information about my location or situation could compromise safety
    When I decide what to share with which family members
    Then the family_elohim helps me track what information each person has
    And provides graduated privacy controls for different relationships
    And alerts me if information sharing could create safety risks
    And helps me maintain consistent boundaries about what I disclose
    And supports me withholding information from untrustworthy family
    And my personal_agent reminds me of safety protocols
    And recognizes information management as constant cognitive labor
    And validates that privacy protection is appropriate

  Scenario: Managing children's relationships with extended family during crisis
    Given my children have relationships with grandparents, aunts, uncles, cousins
    And these relationships may be supportive, complicated, or harmful
    When I coordinate children's extended family contact
    Then the family_elohim helps me facilitate healthy family relationships
    And supports me in limiting or supervising problematic relationships
    And tracks children's responses to different family members
    And helps me explain family situations to children age-appropriately
    And coordinates family involvement in children's lives appropriately
    And my personal_agent alerts me to concerning family dynamics
    And recognizes my facilitation of children's family relationships as care work
    And validates my right to protect children from harmful family dynamics

  Scenario: Navigating family judgment and stigma about my circumstances
    Given some family members judge me for leaving, for being "difficult," for accessing assistance
    And I am vulnerable to internalizing family shame and blame
    When family members express stigmatizing attitudes
    Then the family_elohim helps me recognize and resist family stigma
    And validates that leaving abuse was right and necessary
    And provides supportive reframing of stigmatizing narratives
    And helps me set boundaries with judgmental family members
    And connects me to peer support from others who understand
    And my personal_agent reminds me that my choices were brave and appropriate
    And recognizes resisting family judgment as emotional labor
    And supports my right to distance from unsupportive family

  Scenario: Coordinating family participation in children's lives during instability
    Given my children's lives are disrupted by housing changes and crisis
    And extended family wants to support children's stability
    When I organize family involvement in children's education, activities, care
    Then the family_elohim coordinates family practical support
    And helps family members contribute according to their capacity
    And maintains my oversight of all family involvement with children
    And ensures family help is consistent with my parenting values
    And tracks family contributions with care token recognition
    And my personal_agent facilitates communication without overwhelming me
    And recognizes coordination of family help as substantial organizational labor
    And validates that family participation strengthens children's support network

  Scenario: Managing family expectations about my crisis recovery timeline
    Given family members have opinions about how quickly I should "get back on my feet"
    And my actual recovery is proceeding at appropriate pace for trauma
    When family pressure conflicts with my needs
    Then the family_elohim helps me resist family timeline pressure
    And provides language for explaining that recovery takes time
    And validates that my pace is appropriate for my circumstances
    And helps me set boundaries with family members who push too hard
    And connects me to information about normal trauma recovery
    And my personal_agent reminds me that my timeline is right for me
    And recognizes boundary-setting with family as emotional labor
    And supports my right to recover at my own pace

  Scenario: Rebuilding family identity and culture after leaving abuse
    Given my family culture was defined by abusive dynamics
    And I am creating new family identity with my children
    When I establish new family values, traditions, and norms
    Then the family_elohim helps me articulate our family values
    And supports creation of new family traditions that reflect our healing
    And helps children understand our family transformation
    And tracks what family practices we want to keep vs. change
    And validates that redefining family is important work
    And my personal_agent helps me communicate family values consistently
    And recognizes family culture creation as substantial care work
    And celebrates our family becoming who we want to be

  Scenario: Coordinating family decision-making about major changes
    Given major decisions affect my children and our whole family
    And I want children to have age-appropriate voice while I retain authority
    When we face decisions about housing, location, schooling, or other major changes
    Then the family_elohim facilitates age-appropriate family discussions
    And helps children express their needs and preferences
    And supports me in making final decisions considering everyone's input
    And tracks family decision-making process
    And validates children's participation without parentifying them
    And my personal_agent ensures all voices are heard appropriately
    And recognizes inclusive decision-making as sophisticated parenting
    And celebrates family decisions made together

  Scenario: Managing family financial governance with child support uncertainty
    Given I am supposed to receive child support but it's unreliable
    And family finances are therefore unpredictable
    When I manage family financial planning with uncertain child support
    Then the family_elohim helps me plan for multiple scenarios
    And tracks child support payments and non-payments
    And documents non-payment for legal enforcement if needed
    And helps me make financial decisions despite uncertainty
    And connects me to legal resources for child support enforcement
    And my personal_agent alerts me to missing payments
    And recognizes management of financial uncertainty as cognitive labor
    And validates that unreliable support makes everything harder
